stage_6.name: Capital Ship Assault
stage_6.description: Assault an Amarr supercarrier and destroy its fighter wings

stage_7.name: Sisters Rescue
stage_7.description: Assist Sisters of EVE in rescuing refugees from pirate attacks

waves.narrative: The Stratios captain mistakes you for pirates - prove your intentions

stage_8.name: Pirate Invasion
stage_8.description: Repel an Angel Cartel invasion fleet led by the Machariel

stage_6.briefing: The Amarr have deployed a supercarrier to crush the liberation. This capital ship carries hundreds of enslaved souls. Destroy it, free them all.
stage_6.elder_quote: The chains that bind a thousand cannot hold against one who fights for freedom.
stage_6.victory: The supercarrier falls. A hundred souls return to their people.

stage_7.briefing: Sisters of EVE ships carry refugees to safety, but pirates prey on the convoy. The Stratios captain is wary of all armed vessels.
stage_7.elder_quote: Not all who fight the Empire are friends. Prove your worth through action.
stage_7.victory: The Sisters recognize a fellow liberator. The refugees are safe.

stage_8.briefing: The Angel Cartel sees opportunity in chaos. Their Machariel leads an invasion fleet. The liberation cannot afford another enemy.
stage_8.elder_quote: Vultures circle the dying. Show them the Minmatar are not prey.
stage_8.victory: The Cartel retreats. The liberation continues.
